feat.Name: Actor
feat.Description: +1 in Cha., advantage on Deception and Performance checks, mimic the speech of a person or the sounds made by a creature.

feat.Name: Adept of the Black Robes
feat.Description: You learn one 2nd-level spell from enchantment or necromancy school and expend Hit Dice to increases the damage of your spells.

feat.Name: Adept of the Red Robes
feat.Description: You learn one 2nd-level spell from illusion or transmutation school and treat an attack roll as 10 (PB/day).

feat.Name: Adept of the White Robes
feat.Description: You learn one 2nd-level spell from abjuration or divination school and expend a spell slot to reduce damage on a creature.

feat.Name: Agent of Order
feat.Description: +1 in one ability, extra 1d8 force damage, and the target is restrained if it fails its save (PB/day).

feat.Name: Alert
feat.Description: +5 to initiative, you can't be surprised, and creatures you don't see don't gain advantage on attack roll against you.

feat.Name: Artificer Initiate
feat.Description: You learn one cantrip and one 1st-level artificier spell (cast without slot), proficiency with one type of artisan's tools.

feat.Name: Athlete
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Dex., you stand up and climb more quickly, and you can jump with only a 5-ft run.

feat.Name: Baleful Scion
feat.Description: +1 in one ability, extra 1d6+PB necrotic damage, and you regain hp (PB/day).

feat.Name: Blood Magic
feat.Description: Sacrifice hit points and regain spell slots of level 5 or lower.

feat.Name: Bountiful Luck
feat.Description: You can let an ally within 30 ft of you to reroll a 1 on a d20.

feat.Name: Charger
feat.Description: As part of the Dash action you can make a melee attack with a +5 bonus if you move at least 10 ft before.

feat.Name: Chef
feat.Description: +1 in Con. or Wis., proficiency with cook's utensils and cook special food to regain hp.

feat.Name: Cohort of Chaos
feat.Description: +1 in one ability and special random event for a 1 or a 20 on an attack roll or a saving throw.

feat.Name: Competent
feat.Description: +1 in one ability and you gain proficiency in one skill using this ability.

feat.Name: Crossbow Expert
feat.Description: You ignore the loading property of crossbows and don't have disadvantage for being in contact with a creature when you shoot.

feat.Name: Crusher
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Con., 5 ft extra move when you hit (bludgeoning) and attacks with advantage after a critical hit.

feat.Name: Defensive Duelist
feat.Description: You can add your proficiency bonus to your AC if you are wielding a finesse weapon, in reaction to a melee attack.

feat.Name: Divinely Favored
feat.Description: You learn one cleric cantrip, augury and one 1st-level spell from a determined list depending on your alignment.

feat.Name: Dragon Fear
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Con., or Cha. and your Breath Weapon can frighten instead of inflicting damages.

feat.Name: Dragon Hide
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Con., or Cha., your AC becomes 13+Dex. modifier and your retractable claws deal 1d4+Str. modifier slashing damage.

feat.Name: Drow High Magic
feat.Description: You can cast the detect magic spell (at will) and the levitate and dispel magic spells (1/long rest).

feat.Name: Dual Wielder
feat.Description: +1 to AC if you're wielding a melee weapon in each hand, two-weapon fighting with non-light weapon, draw two weapons.

feat.Name: Dungeon Delver
feat.Description: Advantage to Perception and Investigation checks, to saving throws vs traps, and search for traps at normal pace.

feat.Name: Durable
feat.Description: +1 in Con. and for each Hit Dice you regain a minimum of hit points equals to 2 x your Constitution modifier.

feat.Name: Dwarf Fortitude
feat.Description: +1 in Con., and you can spend one Hit Die to heal yourself taking the Dodge action.

feat.Name: Eldritch Adept
feat.Description: You learn one Eldritch Invocation.

feat.Name: Elemental Adept
feat.Description: Your spells ignore resistance to a damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder) and treat any 1 in damage as a 2.

feat.Name: Elven Accuracy
feat.Description: +1 in Dex., Int., Wis., or Cha., and you can reroll one attack roll if you have advantage.

feat.Name: Ember of the Fire Giant
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Con., or Wis. ; resistance to fire damage ; 1d8+PB fire damage + blinded (15-ft-radius ; PB/day).

feat.Name: Fade away
feat.Description: +1 in Dex. or Int., and you can use your reaction to become invisible if you take damage.

feat.Name: Fey Teleportation
feat.Description: +1 in Int. or Cha., you speak Sylvan, and you can cast the misty step spell (1/short rest).

feat.Name: Fey Touched
feat.Description: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., and you learn misty step and one 1st-level spell from divination or enchantment school.

feat.Name: Fighting Initiate
feat.Description: You learn one Fighting Style option from the fighter class.

feat.Name: Flames of Phlegethos
feat.Description: +1 in Int. or Cha., reroll any 1 on fire spell damage, and cause flames to wreathe you if you cast a fire spell.

feat.Name: Fury of the Frost Giant
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Con., or Wis. ; resistance to cold damage ; 1d8+PB cold damage + speed reduced to 0 (PB/day).

feat.Name: Gift of the Chromatic Dragon
feat.Description: Extra 1d4 acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage for 1 min (bonus action). Resistance to 1 of these damages (reaction).

feat.Name: Gift of the Gem Dragon
feat.Description: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., Strength saving throw or 2d8 force damage and pushed away 10 ft in reaction to an attack (PB/day).

feat.Name: Gift of the Metallic Dragon
feat.Description: You can cast cure wounds (1/long rest). As a reaction to an attack, can manifest wings to get +PB to your AC (PB/day).

feat.Name: Grappler
feat.Description: You have advantage on attack rolls when grappling, and can try to restrained a creature grappled by you.

feat.Name: Great Weapon Master
feat.Description: Extra attack after a melee critical hit and you can choose to take -5 to attack roll to add +10 to damage with an heavy weapon.

feat.Name: Guile of the Cloud Giant
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Con., or Wis. ; resistance to attack's damage ; teleport within 30 ft (PB/day).

feat.Name: Gunner
feat.Description: +1 in Dex., proficiency with firearms, ignore loading property of firearms and no disadvantage to attacks within 5 ft.

feat.Name: Healer
feat.Description: You can stabilize a creature and restore it to 1 hp, or restore [1d6+4+its number of Hit Dice] hp to it.

feat.Name: Heavily Armored
feat.Description: +1 in Str. and you gain proficiency with heavy armor.

feat.Name: Heavy Armor Master
feat.Description: +1 in Str. and bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage are reduced by 3 if you are wearing an heavy armor.

feat.Name: Infernal Constitution
feat.Description: +1 in Con., resistance to cold and poison damage, and you have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

feat.Name: Initiate of High Sorcery
feat.Description: You learn one wizard cantrip and two 1st-level spells from a determined list depending on your moon.

feat.Name: Inspiring Leader
feat.Description: Up to 6 creatures within 30 ft of you can gain temporary hp equal to your level + your Cha. modifier.

feat.Name: Keen Mind
feat.Description: +1 in Int., you know which way is north, when is the next sunrise/sunset, and recall any events within the past month.

feat.Name: Keenness of the Stone Giant
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Con., or Wis. ; darkvision 60 ft ; 1d10 force damage with a range of 60 ft + prone (PB/day).

feat.Name: Knight of the Crown
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Dex., or Con., and one ally attacks as a reaction and deals +1d8 damage (PB/day).

feat.Name: Knight of the Rose
feat.Description: +1 in Con., Wis., or Cha., and one creature gains [1d8 + your PB + this ability modificator] temporary hp (PB/day).

feat.Name: Knight of the Sword
feat.Description: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., and you can frighten a target until the end of your next turn (PB/day).

feat.Name: Lightly Armored
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Dex. and you gain profociency with light armor.

feat.Name: Linguist
feat.Description: +1 in Int., you learn three languages, and you can ably create ciphers.

feat.Name: Lucky
feat.Description: You can reroll one d20 or force to reroll an attack roll against you (3/long rest).

feat.Name: Mage Slayer
feat.Description: You can use a reaction to make a melee attack against a spellcaster and advantage on saving throws against spell within 5 ft.

feat.Name: Magic Initiate
feat.Description: You learn two cantrips and one 1st-level spell from one class.

feat.Name: Martial Adept
feat.Description: You learn two maneuvers from Battle Master archetype and gain one superiority die (d6).

feat.Name: Medium Armor Master
feat.Description: No disadvantage to Stealth checks wearing medium armor and Dexterity bonus max to +3 instead of +2.

feat.Name: Medium Weapon Master
feat.Description: You can reroll an attack roll and you can choose to take -3 to attack roll to add +6 to damage with a medium weapon.

feat.Name: Metamagic Adept
feat.Description: You learn two metamagic options and gain 2 sorcery points.

feat.Name: Mobile
feat.Description: Your speed increase by 10 ft, you can Dash on difficult terrain without malus, and don't provoke opportunity attacks in melee.

feat.Name: Moderately Armored
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Dex. and you gain proficiency with medium armor and shields.

feat.Name: Mounted Combatant
feat.Description: Advantage on melee attacks against unmounted creature and force an attack to target you instead of your mount.

feat.Name: Observant
feat.Description: +1 in Int. or Wis., you can read on lips, and you have a +5 bonus in passive Perception and passive Investigation.

feat.Name: Orcish Fury
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Con., add one of the weapon's damage dice, and use a reaction to attack after using Relentless Endurance.

feat.Name: Outlands Envoy
feat.Description: +1 in one ability and you learn misty step and tongues (1/long rest).

feat.Name: Piercer
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Dex., reroll one damage dice when you hit (piercing) and one additional damage dice in case of critical hit.

feat.Name: Planar Wanderer
feat.Description: Resistance to an energy and Int. check to force a portal to open or close for 1 hour (3d8 damage on a failed check).

feat.Name: Poisoner
feat.Description: Proficiency with poisoner's kit, apply as a bonus action and your attacks ignore resistance to poison damage.

feat.Name: Polearm Master
feat.Description: You can make an extra attack with a polearm weapon, and make an opportunity attack if a creature enter your reach.

feat.Name: Prodigy
feat.Description: You gain proficiency with one skill, one tool or one language, and you gain expertise with one skill.

feat.Name: Resilient
feat.Description: +1 in one ability and you gain proficiency in saving throws using this ability.

feat.Name: Righteous Heritor
feat.Description: +1 in one ability and reduce 1d10+PB to a creature as a reaction (PB/day).

feat.Name: Ritual Caster
feat.Description: You have a ritual book with two 1-st level ritual spells from one class and you can later on add other ritual spells you found.

feat.Name: Rune Shaper
feat.Description: You learn comprehend languages and 1/2 PB 1st-level spells (cast with rune or spell slot).

feat.Name: Savage Attacker
feat.Description: You can reroll melee weapon attack damage once per turn.

feat.Name: Scion of the Outer Planes
feat.Description: Resistance to a damage type and ability to cast a cantrip, according to the type of plan chosen.

feat.Name: Second Chance
feat.Description: +1 in Dex., Con., or Cha., and you can force a creature to reroll its attack roll if it hits you.

feat.Name: Sentinel
feat.Description: A successful OA reduce creature's speed to 0 for this turn and possibility to make an OA even if the ennemy take Disengage.

feat.Name: Shadow Touched
feat.Description: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., and you learn invisibility and one 1st-level spell from illusion or necromancy school.

feat.Name: Sharpshooter
feat.Description: Your ranged attacks ignore some cover, no disavantage at long range, and possibility to take -5 to hit for +10 on ranged damage.

feat.Name: Shield Master
feat.Description: Attack also allows to shove, shield bonus to Dex. saving throws againts spells, and no 1/2 damage on successful saving throw.

feat.Name: Skill Expert
feat.Description: +1 in one ability, proficiency in one skill and expertise in one other in which you have proficiency.

feat.Name: Skilled
feat.Description: You gain proficiency with three skills or tools.

feat.Name: Skulker
feat.Description: Ranged weapon attack doesn't reveal your position and possibility to hide in a lighlly obscured area.

feat.Name: Slasher
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Dex., reduce target's speed by 10 ft when you hit (slashing) and target has disadvantage on attacks rolls.

feat.Name: Soul of the Storm Giant
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Con., or Wis.; resistance to lightning and thunder damage ; disadvantage vs you ; 1/2 speed (PB/day).

feat.Name: Spell Sniper
feat.Description: Offensive spell's range doubled, these spells ignore some cover, and you learn one offensive cantrip.

feat.Name: Squat Nimbleness
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Dex., your speed increases by 5 ft, and proficiency and advantage to escape with Acrobatics or Athletics checks.

feat.Name: Squire of Solamnia
feat.Description: Advantage on weapon attacks rolls and +1d8 to damage (PB/day), and 5 ft of movement to mount or dismount.

feat.Name: Strike of the Giants
feat.Description: Extra damage and additional effect when hit with a weapon attack, according to the giant type chosen (PB/day).

feat.Name: Tavern Brawler
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Con., proficiency with improvised weapons, d4 for unarmed strike, and grapple with a bonus action.

feat.Name: Telekinetic
feat.Description: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., you learn mage hand and you can try to telekinetically shove one creature (5 ft).

feat.Name: Telepathic
feat.Description: +1 in Int., Wis., or Cha., you can cast detect thoughts and you can speak telepathically to any creature within 60 ft.

feat.Name: Tough
feat.Description: Your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to twice your level then by +2 at each level.

feat.Name: Vigor of the Hill Giant
feat.Description: +1 in Str., Con., or Wis. ; resistance to be prone ; Hit Dice to regain additional hit points equals to your Con. modifier + PB.

feat.Name: War Caster
feat.Description: You have advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration and you can cast some spells as part of an OA with a reaction.

feat.Name: Weapon Master
feat.Description: +1 in Str. or Dex. and you gain proficiency with four weapons.

feat.Name: Wood Elf Magic
feat.Description: You learn one druid cantrip and can cast the longstrider and pass without trace spells (1/long rest).
